data.message:
First. Eminem's word play is second to none, he's a fucking lyrical genius. And this is 🔥
Second. He doesn't care what color his fans are, only what size of the line they stand on. ✊🏼 #FDT

replies.message: There isn't a damn line in the Sand though. We all have different views, opinions, and issues we face and we bring to our politicians. If we would get rid of that damn line, work as a nation and stand together we might get somewhere! George Washington said that political parties would be a down fall to our nation. He was sadly so right.
Amanda Turner there is a line in the sand.  If you voted for the dotard then you are on the side of the racists and misogynist.
I voted for Trump and I think he's great. Read the comments on here, a LOT of people are for Trump. This just backfired on Em unbelievably!
Sure it's got nothing to do with his new album release @ fukeminen. Your a has been... see I can ryhm too, fuktard.
